mapper.insert: INSERT INTO db_wx.wechat_receive_message (msg_id,to_user_name, from_user_name, create_time, msg_type, content, pic_url, media_id, agent_id, djxh) VALUES ( #{msgId}, #{toUserName}, #{fromUserName}, TO_DATE(#{createTime},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss'), #{msgType}, #{content, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{picUrl, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mediaId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agentId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{djxh, jdbcType=DECIMAL} )
mapper.select: SELECT t.xm, t.sjhm, t.wxh, t.sjhm yhid, t.dzyjdz, '7' AS bmid,TO_CHAR(t.bsylx) zw FROM (SELECT TRIM(sm.xm) xm, sm.sjhm, sm.wxh, sm.dzyjdz, WMSYS.WM_CONCAT(sq.bsylx) bsylx FROM hxwt.t_wsbs_smbs_sqxx sq, hxwt.t_wsbs_smbs_smxx sm WHERE sq.smid = sm.smid AND sq.sfty = 'N' AND sm.sfzsfsm = 'Y' AND sm.sjhsfsm = 'Y' GROUP BY sm.xm, sm.sjhm, sm.wxh, sm.dzyjdz) t
mapper.update: MERGE INTO db_zgfz.t_wxqy_dzb t USING (SELECT trim(sm.xm) xm, trim(sm.sfzjhm) sfzjhm, sm.sjhm, sq.djxh, sq.bsylx FROM hxwt.t_wsbs_smbs_sqxx sq, hxwt.t_wsbs_smbs_smxx sm WHERE sq.smid = sm.smid AND sq.sfty = 'N' AND sm.sfzsfsm = 'Y' AND sm.sjhsfsm = 'Y') tmp ON ( t.sfzjhm = tmp.sfzjhm AND t.xm = tmp.xm AND t.sjhm = tmp.sjhm AND t.djxh = tmp.djxh AND t.bsylx = tmp.bsylx AND t.wxzhid = tmp.sjhm) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (id, sfzjhm, xm, sjhm, djxh, bsylx, wxzhid, yxbz, tbsj, xgsj) VALUES (db_zgfz.sq_wxqy_dzb_id.nextval, tmp.sfzjhm, tmp.xm, tmp.sjhm, tmp.djxh, tmp.bsylx, tmp.sjhm, 'Y', sysdate, sysdate)

UPDATE db_zgfz.t_wxqy_dzb t SET t.yxbz = 'N', t.xgsj = sysdate WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ( SELECT trim(sm.xm) xm, trim(sm.sfzjhm) sfzjhm, sm.sjhm, sq.djxh, sq.bsylx FROM hxwt.t_wsbs_smbs_sqxx sq, hxwt.t_wsbs_smbs_smxx sm WHERE sq.smid = sm.smid AND sq.sfty = 'Y' AND sm.sfzsfsm = 'Y' AND sm.sjhsfsm = 'Y' ) tmp WHERE t.sfzjhm = tmp.sfzjhm AND t.xm = tmp.xm AND t.sjhm = tmp.sjhm AND t.djxh = tmp.djxh AND t.bsylx = tmp.bsylx AND t.wxzhid = tmp.sjhm AND t.yxbz = 'Y' )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO db_wx.t_batch_async_job (jobid, errcode, errmsg, zxsl, zxsj, wxqyh_id) VALUES ( #{jobid, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{errcode, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{errmsg, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{zxsl}, sysdate, #{wxqyhId} )

INSERT INTO db_wx.t_batch_async_job_result (jobid, errcode, errmsg, status, type, total, percentage, execute_time) VALUES(#{jobid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{errcode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{errmsg, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{total, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{percentage, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate )
mapper.select: SELECT jobid AS "jobid", wxqyh_id AS "wxqyhId" FROM db_wx.t_batch_async_job t1 WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM db_wx.t_batch_async_job_result t2 WHERE t1.jobid = t2.jobid AND t2.status = 3 )

SELECT tmp.sqsj, tmp.wsh, tmp.djxh, tmp.nsrmc, tmp.shxydm, tmp.zgswskfj_dm, tmp.slry_dm, tmp.sssx_mc, tmp.wxzhid, tmp.sjhm from (SELECT '20' || SUBSTR(t.wsh, 5, 2) || '年' || SUBSTR(t.wsh, 7, 2) || '月' || SUBSTR(t.wsh, 9, 2) || '日' sqsj, t.wsh, TO_CHAR(t.djxh) djxh, n.nsrmc, NVL2(n.shxydm, n.shxydm, n.nsrsbh) shxydm, n.zgswskfj_dm, t.slry_dm, t.sssx_mc, (SELECT TO_CHAR(WMSYS.WM_CONCAT(d.wxzhid)) FROM db_zgfz.t_wxqy_dzb d WHERE d.djxh = t.djxh AND d.yxbz = 'Y') wxzhid, (SELECT TO_CHAR(WMSYS.WM_CONCAT(d.sjhm)) FROM db_zgfz.t_wxqy_dzb d WHERE d.djxh = t.djxh AND d.yxbz = 'Y') sjhm FROM hxwt.t_sx_zftzs t, hx_dj.dj_nsrxx n WHERE t.djxh = n.djxh AND t.status = '0') tmp WHERE tmp.wxzhid is not null

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO db_wx.t_wx_cbcj_tmp (djxh, nsrmc, shxydm, zgswskfj_dm, ssgly_dm, zsxmmcs) SELECT m.djxh,n.nsrmc,NVL2(n.shxydm, n.shxydm, n.nsrsbh) shxydm,m.zgswskfj_dm,n.ssgly_dm,m.zsxmmcs FROM ( SELECT tmp.djxh, tmp.zgswskfj_dm, TO_CHAR(WMSYS.WM_CONCAT(tmp.zsxmmc)) zsxmmcs FROM ( SELECT t.djxh, t.zgswskfj_dm, (select z.zsxmmc from hx_dm_qg.dm_gy_zsxm z where z.zsxm_dm = t.zsxm_dm) zsxmmc FROM DB_ZGFZ.T_ZG_YSBTJ t WHERE TJNY = #{tjnd} AND WSBBZ = 'Y' ) tmp GROUP BY tmp.djxh, tmp.zgswskfj_dm ) m, hx_dj.dj_nsrxx n WHERE m.djxh = n.djxh
mapper.select: SELECT t.djxh, t.nsrmc, t.shxydm, t.zgswskfj_dm, t.ssgly_dm, t.zsxmmcs, TO_CHAR(WMSYS.WM_CONCAT(d.wxzhid)) wxzhid FROM db_wx.t_wx_cbcj_tmp t, DB_ZGFZ.t_Wxqy_Dzb d WHERE t.djxh = d.djxh AND d.yxbz = 'Y' GROUP BY t.djxh, t.nsrmc, t.shxydm, t.zgswskfj_dm, t.ssgly_dm, t.zsxmmcs
